Comfirm AlphaMail Node.js Client

¶ Comfirm AlphaMail Node.js Client

Use this library to connect your Node.js application to the AlphaMail system. Start sending transactional e-mail today without the hassle of SMTP and large blocks of unmaintainable HTML.

AlphaMail supports templating (Comlang), DKIM-signatures and reliable delivery. Beside that, we got awesome statistics.

http://www.comfirm.se/

Install with NPM:

$ npm install alphamail
